body.description: The 15.6” Full HD IPS ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z USB monitor enables portability on the go with USB-C and micro HDMI connectivity to display content from a wide-range of portable devices. Providing an expansive view, MB16AH-Z is the ideal travel companion for laptops to maximize work efficiency and simplicity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ASUS is one of Fortune magazine’s World’s Most Admired Companies and is one of the top motherboard and gaming brands as well as a top-three consumer notebook vendor. ASUS is driven by passion and innovation and dedicated to creating quality products for a future smart life, designing and manufacturing products that perfectly meet the needs of today's digital home, office and person. ZenScreen MB16AH-Z ASUS ZenScreen 15.6” 1080P Portable USB Monitor (MB16AH-Z) - Full HD, IPS, USB Type-C, USB-powered, Micro-HDMI, Flicker Free, Blue Light Filter, Tripod Mountable, Anti-glare surface, Protective Sleeve USB-C and micro-HDMI ports provide versatile connectivity with laptops, game consoles, and cameras. Can automatically sense its orientation and switch the monitor between landscape and portrait modes. 15.6-inch Full HD portable anti-glare IPS display with an ultra-slim design helps you get things done more efficiently when you’re on the go. Foldable sleeve case can be turned into a stand to prop the monitor up in either portrait or landscape mode. ASUS Eye Care monitors feature TÜV Rheinland-certified Flicker-free and Low Blue Light technologies to ensure a comfortable viewing experience. What’s in the Box: Micro HDMI to HDMI, USB C cable, USB C to A dongle, Power Adapter, Protective Sleeve, Quick Start Guide Free 1-month Adobe Creative Cloud Subscription: Receive complimentary access with the purchase of this product (offer valid from 9/15/2021 to 8/31/2023).

USB-C and Micro-HDMI Connectivity Featuring USB-C and micro-HDMI connectivity, ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z lets you display content from a wide variety of devices, including laptops, smartphones, game consoles, and cameras, providing a more expansive view for work or play. The reversible, any-way-up USB-C design enables quick, hassle-free connection to any device. *MB16AH-Z supports USB Type-C DisplayPort Alternate Mode. A supported device is also required to enable this function. Automatic Screen Orientation With ASUS DisplayWidget software*, ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z can automatically sense its orientation and switch the display between landscape and portrait modes. Landscape mode is ideal for presentations and Excel sheets, while Portrait mode gives you a perfect view of items such as documents, books or mobile websites. *Driver required. Auto Rotate function only works with Windows OS.

Wide Viewing Angles ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z features a Full HD panel that delivers stunning 1920 x 1080 resolution visuals. It uses IPS technology to give you more flexibility when extending your screen, so you still get superb color and contrast — even from extreme viewing positions. ASUS Blue Light Filter Exclusive ASUS Ultra-Low Blue Light technology protects you from harmful blue light. It offers four blue light filter settings that are easily accessed through the onscreen display menu via the hotkey. ASUS Flicker-free Technology It's time to say goodbye to those tired, strained eyes. ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z features TÜV Rheinland-certified ASUS Flicker-free technology to reduce flicker for a comfortable viewing experience. This technology helps minimize instances of eyestrain and other damaging ailments, especially when you spend long, countless hours in front of a display watching favorite videos.

Foldable Smart Case An innovative foldable smart case protects ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z from dust and scratches. The case can be folded into a stand to prop the display up in either portrait or landscape orientation. ZenScreen Go MB16AH-Z also has a smart pen hole in the bottom right-hand corner, where you can insert a pen to prop the screen up when not using the smart case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Travel & Quick Presentations & Doesn't Require A Separate Plug To Turn On
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this monitor so I could work remotely and do work presentations with my clients and colleagues, and it works perfectly for both purposes. I am much less productive whenever I travel without a duplicate screen since most monitors are too large to travel with easily. This monitor is the perfect size and even comes with a perfect-sized travel case so both the monitor and the case can fit in the same pocket as my laptop (see attached photos)! The setup only takes 10-15 seconds since the case couples as the stand and is very sturdy and high quality (see other attached photos).I also love the image quality of the screen along with the colors and sound. I recently decided to watch some Netflix movies using the monitor since it was already set up. When I duplicated the monitor, I preferred the screen quality and sound coming from the monitor over my Lenovo T470 laptop.Another thing I ended up preferring with this monitor over a traditional monitor is I don't need to plug it into the wall to turn on, instead, it automatically pulls the power from my laptop or whatever it is plugged into! At first, I wasn't sure I preferred this, but considering it barely pulls any power to keep on, I can use it for a full 8 hours on my Lenovo laptop, which is maybe 15-30 minutes shorter than its normal use without the monitor!I would recommend this monitor to anyone looking for something small, travel-friendly, yet high-quality and simple to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: I travel a decent amount for work and quite often I miss having multiple displays like I have at home. I picked this screen up and it compliments my enterprise laptop nicely. I specifically purchased the HDMI model since I wanted to use it on my iPad and my laptop. Both of those devices have a single USB-C port which happens to also be how you charge them.PROs - light and thin enough to fit in laptop bag - decent brightness - HDMI option is more flexible on device support - works great on an iPad with an adapter - works great on my work laptop without any software installsCONs - HDMI option means I must have external power brick - case/stand isn’t always the greatest - Velcro on the case/stand is annoyingly loud in a conference room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good as a travel monitor for light work and spreadsheets. Movies aren't good
reviews.reviewText: Purchased on a Prime Day sale and am glad I didn't pay full price. It is a good little monitor and does the basic job and looks good in a work setting.The tripod mount is plastic and feels okay but I worry about its longevity in a travel situation where I am having to set it up and pack it up multiple times a week. It was very easy to plug and play once I got the correct adapters, as it would not run with my S22 Ultra without USB-C to HTMI dongle AND connecting the screen to a separate power supply, but it worked great with Dex after that.It was easy to load the drivers to my Asus Zenbook but it is taking me a little bit to get the screen colors and settings to match my laptop. No matter what I try, the portable monitor is always a little off with the colors.Movies and TV shows don't look great on this. It is doable in a pinch but I definitely won't be watching daily movies on this. I've had much older and cheaper displays perform significantly better than this screen does in that department.The protective case it comes with is nice and snug but not really protective, and using it as a stand is very fiddly and not sturdy.It is an excellent little workhorse for data entry on a Windows machine. And hooking it up to my larger portable charger has eliminated the need to be plugged into a wall to avoid my laptop battery draining too fast. The speakers are a little quiet but I didn't expect stero quality from monitor speakers.No screen flickers and it looks great for office work, especially turning it into portrait mode for data entry. I've gotten compliments for my mobile setup from others out in public.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome External Monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item to be an external screen to my Amateur Radio (Yaesue FT-710) as the internal screen to my radio is a bit too small for me to see everything clearly (my bad eyes). This external monitor is AWESOME and BEAUTIFUL! The screen resolution is great and makes my radio station look professional now! I highly recommend this option to any other Amateur Radio operators looking for a GREAT external monitor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The speakers sound defective when connected to my macbook pro
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed the sleek design and lightweight portability of this monitor. However, the speakers were such a letdown. They sound defective and distorted. I wouldn't recommend it if you expect to listen to music, audiobooks, or gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up. The quality is as what I expected. The picture is very sharp and the sound from speakers is great. Auto rotate functions well but you need to download a specific software from ASUS to make it work. Excellent device for work anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the Brightest
reviews.reviewText: Compare yourself in the two pictures I supplied. On the left is the monitor, and on the right is my laptop.The Monitor colors are not true and the white light is dull, dark at highest setting.The laptop is also by ASUS, same brand for good comparison.So far the Laptop is excellent, I will review separately at a later date.The ASUS Monitor (ASUS ZenScreen 15.6” 1080P Portable USB Monitor (MB16AH-Z))Negatives:1) Horrible Brightness at full brightness.2) Horrible Color, Contrast at the best settings.Positives:1) The Size.2) Design Style.3) feather lite.I would NOT buy again and I do not recommend because of the Negatives listed.I hope this helps...Robert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024

reviews.reviewText: La he estado probando dos semanas y considero muy buena pantalla portátil, el consumo es menos de 7 watts ya que lo tengo en modo eco, así que considero que es una buena inversión para un monitor extra, el único detalle es que al ser pantalla de 15 pulgadas no tienes mucho espacio, pero ya que yo uso laptop y me gusta la portabilidad me encanta.

Muy buena pantalla. Es súper ligera para cargar y la funda está muy bien hecha para funcionar como funda y como soporte para poner la pantalla en el escritorio. El acabado mate de la pantalla ayuda mucho a que no tenga muchos reflejos de luz. Es fácil colocarla en modo horizontal o vertical. Tra cable micro usb para que jale corriente de la laptop al mismo tiempo que proyecta imagen, y también se puede con micro hdmi, pero supongo que para usarla con hdmi se necesita también conectar el micro usb aparte a corriente para que tenga fuente de electricidad la pantalla. Vale el costo que tiene.

Aunque su funda no es del todo practica cómo una magnética proteje muy bien la pantalla, también no funciona de manera instantánea la rotación automática sin haber instalado el driver, cosa que no indica el manual pero por lo demás todo bien
Esta perfecta la calidad del producto.Las conexiones que permite es lo mejor.Lo recomiendo mucho.
The media could not be loaded. Me encantó está súper ligera y muy fácil de usa
